<template>
  <section class="section section--Hero">
   
  </section>
</template>
    
<script>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import { gsap, power3 } from 'gsap';
import SplitType from 'split-type'

export default {
  name: 'Intro',
  props: {
  },

  setup() {
    onMounted(() => {
     


    })

    return {
    };
  }

}
</script>
    
<style lang="scss" scoped>
.section {
  // overflow-x: hidden;
  height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  flex-direction: column;

  &--intro {
    position: relative;
    justify-content: center;

    .hero_img {
      position: absolute;
      top: 50%;
      left: 50%;
      transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
      border-radius: 999999px;
      overflow: hidden;
      z-index: 10;

      >img {
        width: 100%;
      }
    }

    .roll_wrap {

      ul {
        align-self: center;
        position: relative;

        li {
          transform: skew(0, 355deg);

          .boxes {
            display: block;
            align-self: center;
            position: relative;
            width: 100%;

            .box {
              white-space: nowrap;
              display: flex;
              justify-content: center;
              flex-wrap: nowrap;
              flex-direction: row;
              animation: scrollBigMarquee 240s 0s linear forwards infinite;
              margin-top:vw(20px);
              @keyframes scrollBigMarquee {
                0% {
                  transform: translateX(0);
                }

                100% {
                  transform: translateX(-100%);
                }
              }

              span {
                display: inline-flex;
                color: #c33130;
                font-size: vw(140px);
                letter-spacing: vw(-5px);
                align-items: center;
                font-weight: bold;

                &:nth-child(even) {
                  -webkit-text-stroke: 1px #c33130;
                  color: transparent;
                }

                &:after {
                  content: '';
                  width: vw(30px);
                  height: vw(30px);
                  background: #c33130;
                  border-radius: 50%;
                  margin: vw(0 10px);
                }
              }

              &:nth-child(2) {
                animation: scrollBigMarquee1 240s 0s linear forwards infinite;

                @keyframes scrollBigMarquee1 {
                  0% {
                    transform: translateX(0%);
                  }

                  100% {
                    transform: translateX(100%);
                  }
                }
              }
              &:first-child{ margin-top:0; }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }



}</style>
